N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 270-6.8 - Grants in fee simple or conversion: appraisal

State Regulations

Grants in fee simple of State-owned lands underwater
shall be appraised based upon the value of the adjacent upland developed from
the income, cost or market approach to value, as appropriate, reduced by the
value of the riparian or littoral interest of the adjacent upland owner. Grants
converting prior conditional conveyances to fee conveyances shall be appraised
based upon the value of the remaining interest in the State. Notes
